mapper.select: SELECT A.dt AS DATE, SUBSTRING(A.dt,0,5) AS YEAR, SUBSTRING(A.dt,5,2) AS MONTH, SUBSTRING(A.dt,7,2) AS DAY, ISNULL(B.PLAN_QTY_SUM,0) AS SUM FROM CheckDayOff A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT WORK_DATE, ISNULL(SUM(PLAN_QTY),0) AS PLAN_QTY_SUM FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT WHERE 1=1 AND WORK_DATE BETWEEN #{workDate}+'01' AND #{workDate}+'31' AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND LINEID = #{lineid} AND MATERIALID = #{materialid} GROUP BY WORK_DATE )B ON A.dt = B.WORK_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND A.dt BETWEEN #{workDate}+'01' AND #{workDate}+'31' ORDER BY A.dt

SELECT AA.dt AS DATE, SUBSTRING(AA.dt,0,5) AS YEAR, SUBSTRING(AA.dt,5,2) AS MONTH, SUBSTRING(AA.dt,7,2) AS DAY, ISNULL(BB.PROD_QTY_SUM,0) AS SUM FROM CheckDayOff AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.WORK_DATE, ISNULL(SUM(B.PROD_QTY),0) AS PROD_QTY_SUM FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A LEFT JOIN DSP_WORK_CONTENTS B ON A.DATASEQ = B.WORKDAILY_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.WORK_DATE BETWEEN #{workDate}+'01' AND #{workDate}+'31' AND A.FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND A.LINEID = #{lineid} AND A.MATERIALID = #{materialid} GROUP BY A.WORK_DATE )BB ON AA.dt = BB.WORK_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND AA.dt BETWEEN #{workDate}+'01' AND #{workDate}+'31' ORDER BY AA.dt

SELECT AA.dt AS DATE, SUBSTRING(AA.dt,0,5) AS YEAR, SUBSTRING(AA.dt,5,2) AS MONTH, SUBSTRING(AA.dt,7,2) AS DAY,ISNULL(BB.FAIL_QTY_SUM,0) SUM FROM CheckDayOff AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.WORK_DATE, ISNULL(SUM(B.FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY),0) AS FAIL_QTY_SUM FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A LEFT JOIN DSP_WORK_CONTENTS B ON A.DATASEQ = B.WORKDAILY_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.WORK_DATE BETWEEN #{workDate}+'01' AND #{workDate}+'31' AND A.FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND A.LINEID = #{lineid} AND A.MATERIALID = #{materialid} GROUP BY A.WORK_DATE )BB ON AA.dt = BB.WORK_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND AA.dt BETWEEN #{workDate}+'01' AND #{workDate}+'31' ORDER BY AA.dt
